long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Regular wishlists don't work. You can choose as many things from one shop but you don't shop in just one place. You need a wishlist that can be used with every shop.

This chrome extension integrates with your shoplift.me account and shows a button on product webpages, allowing you to seamlessly add the product to one of your wishlists.

This allows you to easily keep track of all the things you want and share them with friends and family.

Start building your wishlist today
